fields.label: Containerspertest Flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that each workitem "Test Method" should be tested against individual containers.  That said, multiple tests need to be tested from separate containers.

fields.label: Containersperrepeat Flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that each workitem "Test Method" repeat should be tested against individual containers.  That said, multiple test repeats need to be tested from separate containers.

fields.label: Numrepeats
fields.description: Default number of times this test method is to be performed when testing samples.

fields.label: Destructivetest Flag
fields.description: YN Flag to indicate that this workitem "Test Method" is destructive.  That said, it means from an inventory point of view, the material can not be used for any other test.

fields.label: Reusecontainer Flag
fields.description: YN Flag indicating that this workitem "Test Method" is to be tested multiple times again and again on the same container.  Typical use in stability is for WeightLoss testing.

relations.relationship: [REF].[SPECPARAMITEMS].[PARAMID] = [REF].[PARAMLISTITEM].[PARAMID] AND [REF].[SPECPARAMITEMS].[PARAMTYPE] = [REF].[PARAMLISTITEM].[PARAMTYPE] AND ( (  [REF].[SPECPARAMITEMS].[PARAMLISTID] = [REF].[PARAMLISTITEM].[PARAMLISTID] AND [REF].[SPECPARAMITEMS].[PARAMLISTVERSIONID] = [REF].[PARAMLISTITEM].[PARAMLISTVERSIONID] AND [REF].[SPECPARAMITEMS].[VARIANTID] = [REF].[PARAMLISTITEM].[VARIANTID] AND ( [REF].[SPECPARAMITEMS].[ALLOWANYPARAMLISTFLAG] IS NULL OR [REF].[SPECPARAMITEMS].[ALLOWANYPARAMLISTFLAG] = 'N') ) OR ( [REF].[SPECPARAMITEMS].[PARAMLISTID] = [REF].[PARAMLISTITEM].[PARAMLISTID] AND [REF].[SPECPARAMITEMS].[VARIANTID] = [REF].[PARAMLISTITEM].[VARIANTID] AND [REF].[SPECPARAMITEMS].[ALLOWANYPARAMLISTFLAG] = 'V' ) OR [REF].[SPECPARAMITEMS].[ALLOWANYPARAMLISTFLAG] = 'Y' )
relations.where: SPECPARAMITEMS.PARAMLISTID = PARAMLISTITEM.PARAMLISTID AND SPECPARAMITEMS.PARAMLISTVERSIONID = PARAMLISTITEM.PARAMLISTVERSIONID AND SPECPARAMITEMS.VARIANTID = PARAMLISTITEM.VARIANTID AND SPECPARAMITEMS.PARAMID = PARAMLISTITEM.PARAMID AND SPECPARAMITEMS.PARAMTYPE = PARAMLISTITEM.PARAMTYPE
